sentence.Network_en: To investigate the value of MRI in diagnosis of diffuse axonal injury.
sentence.Network_cn: 目的:探讨脑弥漫性轴索损伤(DAI)的MRI诊断价值.

sentence.Network_en: After nerve injury, the nerve function can be compensated by axonal plasticity.
sentence.Network_cn: 脑外伤后神经损伤可通过轴突的可塑性来代偿其功能.

sentence.Network_en: Oligodendrocyte damage and subsequent axonal demyelination is a hallmark of this disease.
sentence.Network_cn: 少突胶质细胞损害,继而轴突脱髓鞘为本病特征.

PerfectNetExp.abs: axonal 影响轴索的, axonal 轴突的, axonal 轴突再生
objective . to evaluate the outcome of preconditioned peripheral nerves a permissive environment in axonal regeneration of the injured spinal cord .评估预先处理的周围神经可否作为脊髓损伤轴性再生的有效的环境。

glaucoma optic neuropathy involves biomechanical damage . ischemia and mechanics stress within lamina cribrosa ( LC ) play an important role in axonal damage .生物力学因素与青光眼视神经病变有关，筛板处的缺血和作用于该处的机械压力，在青光眼的轴浆流损害中起着重要作用。
tissue engineering , as an emerging and rapidly growing field , has received extensive attention for nervous system axonal guidance .作为一个新兴的迅速发展的领域，因能作为神经轴突生长的导向，组织工程已经受到了广泛的关注。

list.abs: ...轴突运输编辑轴突运输(axonal transport)在神经元细胞中,轴突末端到细胞体的距离很长,并且轴突末梢要释放大量的神经递质,所以神经元必须不断供给大量的物质,包括蛋白质，膜,以补充因轴突部位的胞吐.
